seriesJson.title: Exploring the child's world IV
seriesJson.description: Interviews with delinquent and disturbed young people who are encouraged to discuss their experiences and express feelings. To protect individuals, each program is a re-creation of an actual interview using different names and places.

node.title: Precocious neo-adult
node.description: This program focuses on a precocious youth who "overaspires and underachieves."

node.title: Girl in a box car
node.description: This program focuses on the life of an orphan who has attempted suicide.

node.title: Let the world adjust to me
node.description: This program focuses on a girl who ran away from home and wound up in reform school.

node.title: Life is a bunch of pain
node.description: This program focuses on a boy who says he was framed on a morals charge.

node.title: No dates after 2am
node.description: This program focuses on a teenage girl with a poor self-image and is often involved with older men.

node.title: A non-care package
node.description: This program focuses on a boy who is uncared for.

node.title: Troubled shooter
node.description: This program focuses on a teenage girl who shot a boy.

node.title: The urban nomad
node.description: This program focuses on a teen who lives a nomadic, criminal existence.

node.title: Marie
node.description: This program focuses on children with chaotic family situations.

node.title: Timmy
node.description: This program focuses on Timmy and the issue of the unloved child.

node.title: Mary Jean
node.description: This program focuses on Mary Jean and the issue of youths interacting with strangers.

node.title: Rocky
node.description: This program focuses on Rocky, a youth who struggles with "mascuiline identification."

node.title: Laurie
node.description: This program focuses on Laurie, a teenger who has an unhealthy relationship with her father.
